error_msg: The parameters for PermutationFeatureImportance should be one of ['scoring', 'n_repeats', 'random_state', 'max_samples'].
description: Permutation Feature Importance is a explanation method to asses the importance of each feature in a model by evaluating how much the model's performance decreases when the values of a specific feature are randomly shuffled.

oneOf.error_msg: The 'scoring' parameter must be one of 'accuracy', 'balanced_accuracy', 'average_precision', 'precision', 'recall', 'roc_auc'.
oneOf.description: Scorer to evaluate how the perfomance of the model changes when a particular feature is shuffled.

oneOf.error_msg: The 'n_repeats' parameter should be a positive integer.
oneOf.description: Number of times to permute a feature.

oneOf.error_msg: The 'random_state' parameter should be a positive integer.
oneOf.description: Seed for the random number generator to control the permutations of each feature.

oneOf.error_msg: The 'max_samples' parameter should be a positive integer.
oneOf.description: The number of samples to draw from the dataset to calculate feature importance at each repetition.
